files.patch:
@@ -215,0 +215,2 @@
+        // GitLab is too smart for it's own best and mangles URLs that contain a
+        // partial hit with the base MR, hence the double slash.
@@ -216,1 +218,1 @@
-                .setPath("/" + projectName + "/-/merge_requests/" + prId + ".diff")
+                .setPath("/" + projectName + "/-/merge_requests//" + prId + ".diff")
